medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Gradual onset right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain with radiation to back since a few hours prior to admission. The pain is sharp, moderate in severity, and has been present for hours. The patient reports a history of nephrolithiasis and describes the pain as feeling similar to renal colic. Positive for nausea and a small amount of diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Knee surgery and one episode of nephrolithiasis.
